allNoBuild.comment: '_all' is a special/reserved word for getting ALL modules

allNoBuildCss.comment: like 'allNoBuild' except we WANT 'buildTempCss', which has compiled 'base.css' (from '_base.less') in it

skipPrefixTest.comment: Any bad file name will NOT be included but a special 'skipPrefix' (defaults to __) can be used to (properly) 'comment out' lines / modules to include
